name: Ruruna Lv.1 Vs. The attack of the Crab King Lv.1
name_original: Ruruna Lv.1 Vs. The attack of the Crab King Lv.1
description:
Ruruna is facing off the Crab King. Help her save the day~!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

J - Sword

K - Shuriken

L - Kunai

Known issues:

1.  In help, WASD is displayed as WADD;

2. Crab King keeps shooting bubbles after dead. (Does not affect gameplay);

3. Ruruna's level on title screen is displaying Crab King's level.

Useful tips:

- Combo increases the damage you do.

- Ruruna levels up by doing damage.

- Shuriken is good to build up combo.

- Sword is good for popping bubbles.

- Kunais are good for extra ranged damage.

Future Update:

Here is a small list of things to add to this game if it is well received.

1. BGM/SFX;

2. More attack patterns and behaviors for the Crab King (including more sprites);

3. Stat points for character customization;

4. More bosses.

Got a suggestion? Leave it in the comments~! :D
